features: Save floor space while adding storage to your bathroom with this medicine cabinet featuring a smooth, white painted finish, decorative side grooves and a two-tone silver handle
Interior includes one open lower shelf and an interior adjustable shelf, ideal for storing small toiletries, toothpaste, medications, makeup supplies and other bathroom necessities
Soft close hinges protect the exterior mirror, while the top board features crown molding for a timeless, traditional style
Includes easy-to-follow assembly and wall-mounting instructions
Pair with any of the additional Somerset Collection items for a newly organized space
body.description: Featuring a smooth painted finish and two-tone, satin/mirror finish silver handle, this classically designed cabinet will make the perfect addition to your space. With its interior, 3-position adjustable shelf and two fixed shelves, this cabinet is the ideal place for storing toiletries, toothbrushes, medications, makeup supplies and other bathroom necessities. Soft close hinges protect the exterior mirror, while the top board features crown molding for a timeless, traditional style. Includes easy-to-follow assembly and wall-mounting instructions. Pair with any of the additional Somerset Collection items for a newly organized space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Somerset Collection! Introducing our Somerset Bath Collection – where functionality meets elegance. Embrace the timeless charm of clean white finishes and sleek silver handles that effortlessly elevate your space. Perfect for both bath and laundry storage, these family-friendly products are designed with your convenience in mind. Our Somerset Bath Collection not only adds a touch of sophistication to your home but also offers practical solutions. Each piece features enclosed storage, ensuring your space stays clutter-free and organized. Worried about safety? Rest easy with our adjustable anti-tip wall anchors, providing extra stability and peace of mind, especially in homes with little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty and easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I love the look of this medicine cabinet! We have plenty of room inside for all our things. I took 1 star off for the assembly.. the screws in the back should have had pre drilled holes. Also a few pics in the directions were a bit confusing.. overall very satisfied with this cabinet..!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It seems fine, everything seems to be here except the instructions. I can’t quite figure out where the right screws go without them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice. Not thrilling, but nice.
reviews.reviewText: Needs to come with two shelves and better engineering. You’ll need a right angle adaptor to mount it easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You must assemble it. You get box of parts that you must screw together and assemble yourself.
reviews.reviewText: It not clearly stated that you must assemble the entire thing in the description. You get a box with loose pieces and must assemble it. Instructions were ok at best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bottom piece of cabinet broke during the assembly process.
reviews.reviewText: When assembling the last piece of the product the bottom portion of the cabinet broke.
I have purchased 5 of these over in the past year and are absolutely beautiful in my bathrooms. Good quality and nice storage. Mirrors clean up beautifully as well.

I bought this product in good faith and it was absolute rubbish. It barely held together. Poor workmanship, shoddy hinges, and a nightmare to create. The tradesman renovating my bathroom spent an hour glueing it together so it had any chance of sitting securely on my wall. Buyer beware. This is a complete waste of money.

Nice cabinet, however I wanted it to have a left hand hinge. No provision is made to have the hinges installed on the left side. I did that, wasn't any issue, however this could have easily have been done at the source. Be very careful if deciding to go with the left hand hinge. Pre-drill the holes needed and careful not to shoot all the way through the cabinet wall. A 1/16 th. bit will be adequate for the holes needed. (Install the hinges on the door first) Mark the hinge holes on the cabinet wall Then install two screws for each hinge at the adjustment hinge holes and fit to the cabinet, mark your holes, drill out and install the door. Then do the remaining four screws while doing the door adjustments.
